dublin_core.dcvalue: JAMIA is AMIA s premier peer reviewed journal for biomedical and health informatics Covering the full spectrum of activities in the field JAMIA includes informatics articles in the areas of clinical care clinical research translational science implementation science imaging education consumer health public health and policy JAMIA s articles describe innovative informatics research and systems that help to advance biomedical science and to promote health Case reports perspectives and reviews also help readers stay connected with the most important informatics developments in implementation policy and education
Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association
Journal of the American Medical Informatics Association
